General.Name: Consórcio Alfa de Administração S.A
General.Description: Consórcio Alfa de Administração S.A. provides financing, insurance and pension plans, and technology and services in Brazil. It operates through Insurance and Services segments. The company was formerly known as Consórcio Real Brasileiro de Administração S.A. and changed its name to Consórcio Alfa de Administração S.A. in 1999. The company was incorporated in 1952 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. Consórcio Alfa de Administração S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Administradora Fortaleza Ltda.
General.Address: Alameda Santos, nº 466, São Paulo, SP, Brazil
